Class TicTacToeGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicTacToeGrid

  • public class TicTacToeGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the object methods for Assignment 3: Tic-Tac-Toe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TicTacToeGrid()
      This constructor initiates the nums array as 9 slots.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawGrid()
      This method prints out the TicTacToe board including all previous moves.

      This method fills the nums array with numbers representing where players can move.

      This method checks to see if either player has won or not.

      This method returns whether or not a place is available to put a move in.

      This method detects if there are any moves left to make in the game.

      This method finds the best place for the AI to move.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToeGrid

        public TicTacToeGrid()
        This constructor initiates the nums array as 9 slots.

    • Method Detail

      • drawGrid

        public void drawGrid()
        This method prints out the TicTacToe board including all previous moves.

      • putMarkerIn

        public void putMarkerIn(java.lang.String marker,
               int place)
        This method writes to the nums[] array in the place of someone's move and with their marker (i.e. "x" or "o").
        Parameters:
        marker - Either an "x" or "o" depending on player.
        place - Number where player has selected their move to go.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - ie This allows another method it is calling to finish without going on.
        See Also:
        ie

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(int place)
        This method returns whether or not a place is available to put a move in.
        Parameters:
        place - Number where player has selected their move to go.
        Returns:
        boolean determining if the parameter place is available.

      • findWinner

        public java.lang.String findWinner()
        This method checks to see if either player has won or not.
        Returns:
        the status of the winner or that the game has not finished.

      • makeASmartMove

        public int makeASmartMove()
        This method finds the best place for the AI to move.
        Returns:
        the number of the place where the AI's move will go.

      • fill

        public void fill()
        This method fills the nums array with numbers representing where players can move.

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        This method detects if there are any moves left to make in the game.
        Returns:
        a boolean value of whether or not the board is full or not.
